content: As sworn allies, we fight, never been apart. Winning is the only way for us to live. Those of who lost their lives live in our minds. Everything I have seen still not the past. Grieving rain of tears. Just falling on me. Piercing my heart; it flows to the sea. Grieving rain of blood. Just wearing for me. Dyeing my soul, and it flows to the sea.
author: Galneryus
